sentences.english: We regret the four of the items enquired for in your Fax are unfortunately not available for export.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，贵方传真所寻的四项商品均无货可供。

sentences.english: We're sorry nothing is available at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，这种商品暂时无货可供。

sentences.english: The store had no more red shoes in stock, so Mary chose brown ones instead.
sentences.chinese: 店里红色的鞋子无货，所以玛丽选了双棕色的。

sentences.english: We regret that the goods you inquire about are not available.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，你们所询货物目前无货。

sentences.english: 10，We regret that the goods you inquire about are not available.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，你们所询的货物现在无货。

sentences.english: Three of the items enquired for in your letter are unfortunately not available for export.
sentences.chinese: 真不凑巧，来涵所询产品中，有三项无货可供。

sentences.english: We are sorry that this item is out of stock for the time.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，这种商品暂时无货可供。

sentences.english: If Grade A is not available, Grade B will do.
sentences.chinese: 假如一等品无货，二等品也可以或许。

sentences.english: 200If Grade A is not available， Grade B will do。
sentences.chinese: 如果一等品无货，二等品也可以。

sentences.english: The three of the items enquired for in your letter are unfortunately not available for export.
sentences.chinese: 真不凑巧，来涵所询的三项商品均无货可供。

sentences.english: Those record are temporarily out of stock.
Need to add Not in Stock or 1 left in stock to the product page.
sentences.chinese: 需要补充库存无货，或1留给产品页面。

sentences.english: We are sorry that your order of model I is out of stock now.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常抱歉，你方的有关I型号订单，现在无货。

sentences.english: We regret that the goods you inquired about are not available.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，你们所询货物目前无货。

definition: merchandise or commodities available immediately after sale/merchandise in stock/available item/actuals (investment)/actual commodities
property or cash held in reserve/stock
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to cut the price/to drive down the price/to get cheaper
to order goods/to place an order
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
to sell out/to run out (of supplies)/deficient/lack of supplies
